verses.text_plain: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;
verses.verse_html: 1I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;

verses.text_plain: For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.
verses.verse_html: 2For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.

verses.text_plain: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;
verses.verse_html: 3For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;

verses.text_plain: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.
verses.verse_html: 4Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.

verses.text_plain: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
verses.verse_html: 5For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;

verses.text_plain: Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.
verses.verse_html: 6Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.

verses.text_plain: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.
verses.verse_html: 7Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.

verses.text_plain: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.
verses.verse_html: 8I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.

verses.text_plain: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;
verses.verse_html: 9In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;

verses.text_plain: But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.
verses.verse_html: 10But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.

verses.text_plain: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.
verses.verse_html: 11Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.

verses.text_plain: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.
verses.verse_html: 12But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.

verses.text_plain: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.
verses.verse_html: 13For Adam was first formed, then Eve.

verses.text_plain: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.
verses.verse_html: 14And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.

verses.text_plain: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
verses.verse_html: 15Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
